title: Battle Boss Qiyana’s Splash is such an upgrade from her base
body:
https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-QhaBoYw01XM/XP_pyOnzUTI/AAAAAAABUSE/NeNdawLW_MA9GDm-2hMjq5BvgdFzsPe2ACLcBGAs/s1600/246001.jpg

Comparing this over her base, I prefer this 100 times over. There’s more going on in the background other than a big explosion. And her design here is actually pretty rad. Overall it’s an upgrade from her base. Battleboss fits quite well on her.

replies.body: Yeah, I like Qiyana's base splash, but even I can admit the background is garbo. I don't know why they made it an explosion, what purpose does that serve to support her theme/personality? The Battle Boss splash is great.

> [{quoted}](name=AbiwonKenabi,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=aYgz5mUf,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2019-06-12T04:45:11.139+0000)
>
> Yeah, I like Qiyana's base splash, but even I can admit the background is garbo. I don't know why they made it an explosion, what purpose does that serve to support her theme/personality? The Battle Boss splash is great.

The Goal was to sell her high moment, which we found through playing her and from playtests, was her Ult. The Splash is supposed to be right after she ults a wall and it explodes

It seems like it would be a SUPER long stretch between the marksman, which will most likely come out Late September-Early/Mid October, sometime during the Fall, and Fiddle/Voli, who are slated to come out in 2020. But it just seems so weird with her just posing in front of an explosion. Again, compare that to Tristana who has explosions in the background. It’s an action shot, she just blew something up and she just rocket jump away. You can see the trail. It’s interesting too.

Here it just feels weird. Like something is missing.
cool girls don't look at explosions

Eh, speaking as a guy who doesn't know Qiyana's moveset at all, and in no way knows anything about drawing and splash art design (so clearly, my ideas should be regarded with the utmost deference). I think it would have worked better if showing that the explosion is in some way caused by her actions in some way.  Because now it just looks like she's posing in front of an explosion like a cheesy 80s action movie poster.
idk man you guys really missed the mark with her base splash. Her in-game model is better comparatively.
Yall should have debated that more. I'd say her high point is in her using all the elements in her ult.

Hey Reav3, do you think there'll be any time soon to continue updating old splash arts? Early reworks like Twisted Fate and Sivir are still going with their really old splash arts.

I know the release cadence in summer is faster so it might be that artists simply have no time, but I'm hoping they'll get updated SOMEday.
